```{=html}
<style>
    #deadlines-table table {

<div class="calendar-container">
    <div class="calendar-nav">
        <button class="cal-nav-btn" id="prevMonth">&larr; Prev</button>
        <div class="current-month" id="currentMonth"></div>
        <button class="cal-nav-btn" id="nextMonth">Next &rarr;</button>
    </div>
    <div class="calendar-grid" id="calendarGrid"></div>
</div>

<div class="cal-modal" id="eventModal">
    <div class="cal-modal-content">
        <div class="cal-modal-header" id="modalDate"></div>
        <div id="modalEvents"></div>
        <button class="cal-close-btn" id="closeModal">Close</button>
    </div>
</div>

<script>
    let deadlinesData = [];
    let deadlinesByDate = {};
    let currentDate = new Date();
    const dayNames = ['Sun', 'Mon', 'Tue', 'Wed', 'Thu', 'Fri', 'Sat'];

    // Format date as YYYY-MM-DD in local timezone (avoids UTC shift)
    function formatDateLocal(date) {
        const year = date.getFullYear();
        const month = String(date.getMonth() + 1).padStart(2, '0');
        const day = String(date.getDate()).padStart(2, '0');
        return `${year}-${month}-${day}`;
    }

    // Load deadlines from JSON
    fetch('deadlines.json')
        .then(response => response.json())
        .then(data => {
            deadlinesData = data.sort((a, b) => new Date(a.date) - new Date(b.date));

            // Group by date for calendar
            deadlinesData.forEach(d => {
                if (!deadlinesByDate[d.date]) deadlinesByDate[d.date] = [];
                deadlinesByDate[d.date].push({title: d.title, type: d.type});
            });

            renderTable();
            renderCalendar();
        });

    function renderTable() {
        const container = document.getElementById('deadlines-table');
        let html = '<table><thead><tr><th>Date</th><th>Day</th><th>Item</th><th>Type</th></tr></thead><tbody>';

        deadlinesData.forEach(d => {
            const date = new Date(d.date + 'T00:00:00');
            const dayName = date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'short' });
            const dateStr = date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { day: 'numeric', month: 'short', year: 'numeric' });
            const typeLabel = d.type.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + d.type.slice(1);
            html += `<tr><td>${dateStr}</td><td>${dayName}</td><td>${d.title}</td><td class="type-${d.type}">${typeLabel}</td></tr>`;
        });

        html += '</tbody></table>';
        container.innerHTML = html;
    }

    function renderCalendar() {
        const year = currentDate.getFullYear();
        const month = currentDate.getMonth();

        document.getElementById('currentMonth').textContent =
            new Date(year, month).toLocaleDateString('en-US', { month: 'long', year: 'numeric' });

        const firstDay = new Date(year, month, 1);
        const startDate = new Date(firstDay);
        startDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() - firstDay.getDay());

        const grid = document.getElementById('calendarGrid');
        grid.innerHTML = '';

        dayNames.forEach(day => {
            const header = document.createElement('div');
            header.className = 'day-header';
            header.textContent = day;
            grid.appendChild(header);
        });

        const today = new Date();
        for (let i = 0; i < 42; i++) {
            const cellDate = new Date(startDate);
            cellDate.setDate(startDate.getDate() + i);

            const dateStr = formatDateLocal(cellDate);
            const dayEvents = deadlinesByDate[dateStr] || [];

            const cell = document.createElement('div');
            cell.className = 'day-cell';

            if (cellDate.getMonth() !== month) cell.classList.add('other-month');
            if (cellDate.toDateString() === today.toDateString()) cell.classList.add('today');

            cell.innerHTML = `
                <div class="day-number">${cellDate.getDate()}</div>
                ${dayEvents.slice(0, 2).map(e => `<div class="cal-event ${e.type}">${e.title}</div>`).join('')}
                ${dayEvents.length > 2 ? `<div class="cal-event">+${dayEvents.length - 2} more</div>` : ''}
            `;

            cell.addEventListener('click', () => showModal(dateStr, dayEvents));
            grid.appendChild(cell);
        }
    }

    function showModal(dateStr, dayEvents) {
        const modal = document.getElementById('eventModal');
        const date = new Date(dateStr + 'T00:00:00');

        document.getElementById('modalDate').textContent =
            date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' });

        const eventsContainer = document.getElementById('modalEvents');
        if (dayEvents.length === 0) {
            eventsContainer.innerHTML = '<p style="color: #6c757d;">No deadlines</p>';
        } else {
            eventsContainer.innerHTML = dayEvents.map(e => `
                <div class="cal-modal-event">
                    <strong>${e.title}</strong>
                </div>
            `).join('');
        }

        modal.classList.add('active');
    }

    document.getElementById('prevMonth').addEventListener('click', () => {
        currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() - 1);
        renderCalendar();
    });

    document.getElementById('nextMonth').addEventListener('click', () => {
        currentDate.setMonth(currentDate.getMonth() + 1);
        renderCalendar();
    });

    document.getElementById('closeModal').addEventListener('click', () => {
        document.getElementById('eventModal').classList.remove('active');
    });

    document.getElementById('eventModal').addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if (e.target.id === 'eventModal') {
            document.getElementById('eventModal').classList.remove('active');
        }
    });
</script>
```
